title: How to Unlock King Boo on Mario Kart Wii

steps.headline: Insert a Mario Kart Wii game disc.
Select the Disc Channel on the Wii Menu.
Press the "2" or "A" button to start the game.
Select the license you want to unlock King Boo on.
steps.description: If you don't have a license, make one.

steps.headline: Play the 50cc Star Cup.
steps.description: If you don't have the 50cc Star Cup already, you need to play both the 50cc Flower Cup and the 50cc Mushroom Cup and place 3rd or better overall. Then, you will unlock the Star Cup.

steps.headline: Get 1st place overall, and you'll unlock King Boo the next time you choose your license.

tyn: Sensor Bar or Classic Controller/Classic Controller Pro
text: Turn on your Wii system.  Insert a Mario Kart Wii game disc.  Select the Disc Channel on the Wii Menu.  Select Start.  Press the "2" or "A" button to start the game.  Select the license you want to unlock King Boo on. If you don't have a license, make one. Select 1 Player.  Select Grand Prix.  Select 50cc.  Select a character.  Choose a vehicle.  Choose automatic or manual drift.  Play the 50cc Star Cup. If you don't have the 50cc Star Cup already, you need to play both the 50cc Flower Cup and the 50cc Mushroom Cup and place 3rd or better overall. Then, you will unlock the Star Cup. Get 1st place overall, and you'll unlock King Boo the next time you choose your license.
sentences: Insert a Mario Kart Wii game disc.
Select the Disc Channel on the Wii Menu.
Press the "2" or "A" button to start the game.
Select the license you want to unlock King Boo on.
If you don't have a license, make one.
If you don't have the 50cc Star Cup already, you need to play both the 50cc Flower Cup and the 50cc Mushroom Cup and place 3rd or better overall.
Then, you will unlock the Star Cup.
Get 1st place overall, and you'll unlock King Boo the next time you choose your license.
